name: PKCanvasViewDrawingPolicy
desc: Constants that you use to specify the type of drawing gestures your app permits while the user draws on the canvas.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The default input type to use for drawing on a canvas.

items.name: case anyInput
items.desc: Allows drawing on the canvas from any input source.

items.name: case pencilOnly
items.desc: Pencil touches are the only input that draw on the canvas.
